page.title: 05Taunton Brook Nature Reserve
page.content: Taunton Brook is a small valley in between Waterloo County Primary School and Canon Burrows Primary School.Before we cleaned it up,it was one of the areas worst eyesores.It was full of rubbish such as,oil drums,car wheels, cars,wire and other debris. It took a long time to clear up the brook.It took teachers hours to plan and equally as long down the brook to do the work.It took hundreds of hours and hundreds of pounds to make the Brook what it is today.The money is usually collected by 'Coppers' being given by parents,or by donations of money or bulbs and plants.We hope it will stay that way for ever so other people can enjoy it.{ {By Laurence Lee & Steven Dundavan. {
